content:
Today at 13:00 - 15:00 (Europe/Berlin Time), the Grand Finale of the Falling Walls Science Breakthroughs of the Year will be presented and celebrated in a free livestream.

The categories Life Sciences, Physical Sciences, Engineering and Technology, Social Sciences and Humanities, Science in the Arts, Digital Education, Science and Innovation Management, Emerging Talents, Science Start-Ups and Science Engagement Initiatives are a part of it. If you are interested, here is the link to the session. https://falling-walls.com/event/falling-walls-grand-finale-the-breakthroughs-of-the-year/

Free registration (email address): https://falling-walls.com/remote2020/register-now/

Join the Grand Finale of scientists from all around the world.

Falling Walls Grand Finale: The Breakthroughs of the Year | Falling Walls
LIVE: THE 10 BREAKTHROUGHS OF THE YEAR
Register now | Falling Walls
Join Falling Walls and Berlin Science Week 2020 to attend all your favourite digital sessions from 1 â€“ 10 November 2020.
